readable.title: 311146855_0b65fdb169
readable.content: A man and a woman in festive costumes dancing . A man and a woman with feathers on her head dance . A man and a woman wearing decorative costumes and dancing in a crowd of onlookers . one performer wearing a feathered headdress dancing with another performer in the streets Two people are dancing with drums on the right and a crowd behind them .
